samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo demonstrates the basic tree view component that display the data in a hierarchical structure with the configuration options.

samples.name: Local Data
samples.description: This demo demonstrates the binding of local data to the tree view. The local data structure can be hierarchical data or list data.

samples.name: Remote Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>Â®</sup> JS 2 treeview control shows how to bind the data from a remote data service.

samples.name: Icons and Images
samples.description: The tree view nodes can be rendered with any custom icons. This sample demonstrated like a file system with custom icons and images.

samples.name: CheckBox
samples.description: This demo demonstrates the tree view with checkbox functionality, this allows the user to check more than one tree nodes.

samples.name: Node Editing
samples.description: This demo showcases the node editing functionality of tree view, you can edit any node text by double click on it or pressing F2.

samples.name: Multiple Selection
samples.description: The TreeView component allows to select multiple nodes by pressing CTRL key, also can select the range of nodes by pressing SHIFT key.

samples.name: Drag and Drop
samples.description: The tree view nodes can be drag and drop from one position to another, also the drop can be done to another tree view or other external container.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: The tree view node can be customized through the template option. In this demo the tree view nodes are templated like an mail system.
